//: These are backgrounds for the player character, meant to allow unique histories and possible NPC interaction.
name: Acolyte
description: You were an acolyte at one of the temples scattered across the world. You act as an intermediary between the gods and mortal world, performing ceremonies or divine rites. However, there is a difference between this and channeling divine power, as clerics do.

name: Anthroplogist
description: You were an anthroplogist, always having a fascination with other cultures, lost or modern. By studying various civilizations around the world, you have learned much as to how they work; through books, scrolls, and firsthand observation.

name: Archaeologist
description: You were an archaeologist; plumping old mines, tombs, and ruins for tresure and knowledge upon the events of the past, such as religions or cataclysms.

name: Charlatan
description: You were a charlatan, traveling about to commit various get-rich-quick schemes. Cheating games of chance, touting useless junk as valubles, or assuming false identities.

name: City Watch
description: You were part of the city watch, the first line of defense against crime. You weren't a soilder; insetad policing your hometown, protecting its citizens from crime or mallace of any type.

name: Dwarven Craftsman
description: You were the apprintice of a dwarven craftsman, enduring years of hard labor and education to achieve the skills you have today. You are not nessisarily a dwarf, as some clans take on apprenitces of other races.

name: Scholar
description: As a child, you were always inquisitive, and found your way to one of the higher institutions of learning.

name: Criminal
description: You were an experienced criminal skilled at the violation of the law. You have spent a lot of time amongst shady characters; close to murder, theft, and extortion.

name: Entertainer
description: You thrived in front of an audience, lived for the stage. You know what people find humorous, entertaining, and know just what to say.

name: Delta Farmer
description: You were a farmer, living with your livestock and crops. You lived through good and bad times, but you made it.

name: Wizard
description: You were a novice mage once, studying the intricacies of the arcane. You knew magic was meant for you.
